content: Sure, Rao's is an Italian-American restaurant that is hailed as one of the best Italian restaurants in New York City. Besides their famous meatballs, they offer a variety of Italian dishes such as pasta, pizza, seafood, and prime beef. Some of the popular dishes include Rigatoni alla Vodka, Lobster fra Diavolo, Shrimp Scampi, and Veal Parmesan. They also offer a range of salads and appetizers, such as roasted peppers, clams casino, and stuffed mushrooms. Additionally, they have a selection of antipasti, sides, and desserts that are equally delectable.
